headline: Lam Research Bets Big on ALD and Dry EUV: Will This Pay Off?
summary: LRCX focuses on ALD and dry EUV tech to drive chip performance gains, but rivals and macro risks pose key challenges.

headline: AMAT Expects Advanced DRAM Sales to Grow 40%: Can It Keep its Lead?
summary: Applied Materials bets big on DDR5 and HBM, projecting over 40% DRAM revenue growth and strong traction for Sym3 Magnum.
